titleInfo.title: Letter from Charles Umpherston Aitchison, Foreign Department, Government of India Simla to Lewis Pelly

mods.abstract: Brief note enclosing a letter from Major Charles Henry Clay and a response on it from Colonel William Earle.Letter from Major Charles Henry Clay, Second in Command, Deoli Irregular Force, 20 July 1873 regarding Major John Campbell Gunning's appointment over himself to the position of Second in Command, Meywar [MewƒÅr] Corps and his belief that he should have received that appointment and that the Viceroy had sought to vastly improve Major Gunning's position.Letter from Colonel William Earle, Military Secretary to the Viceroy, to Charles Umpherston Aitchison, 4 August 1873 regarding the letter that Clay had written, the inappropriate terms he had used in addressing Colonel Lewis Pelly and his incorrect assumptions over appointments, and requesting that Pelly make some matters clear to him.
